title: Fairfax arm infuses Rs 500 crore into IIFL Finance: Sources
description: Fairfax's Odyssey Reinsurance offers Rs 500 crore debt to IIFL Finance for gold loans. Prem Watsa's subsidiary provides secured, rated bonds at 9.5% coupon. ET's comment requests to IIFL Finance and Fairfax go unanswered.
